events.deleteEventConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this Event?

shareQuotation.reShareConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to re-share this to your email.
shareQuotation.reShareSuccess: Proposal has been shared to your email.
shareQuotation.reShareFailure: Proposal has failed. Please retry in some time.
shareQuotation.tailorMade: This vehicle is tailor-made with the best specifications just for you.
shareQuotation.acceptQuoteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to accept this proposal?
shareQuotation.help: We are there for you in case you need help.
shareQuotation.acceptQuotationText: Congratulations! We’ve sent you an e-mail with the proposal document you need to sign. If you haven’t received it within 3 minutes, please check your spambox. Once we receive your signed proposal, we’ll start the process for delivering your new vehicle to you.
shareQuotation.requestText: You recently submitted a proposal request to us.
shareQuotation.firstSectionContent: The attached proposal has been carefully compiled based on your choices during our previous conversation. Are there things you would like to add, remove or change? Please feel free to contact me so that I can send you a customized proposal.
shareQuotation.secondSectionContent: In addition to the proposal, you will receive an attachment in which we elaborate on the price composition of our {brand}. How do these come about and why do we find transparent prices so important? You can read it all in the attachment.
shareQuotation.thirdSectionContent: You can contact us for all questions regarding mobility. Car financing is an important part of this. Feel free to make an appointment if you would like to know more about our affordable and suitable financing options.
shareQuotation.fourthSectionContent: Does the proposal look good? If you agree with this proposal, you can click on accept proposal. We thank you for your trust and are ready to prepare your {brand} for a festive delivery.
shareQuotation.fourthSectionSubContent: Do you have a question regarding this proposal? Don't hesitate to contact us!
